channel.title: Tools on QuickTouch
channel.description: Recent content in Tools on QuickTouch

item.title: JSON解析
item.description: .tool { padding: 10px; height: 40px; border: solid 1px #eee; background-color: #fff; width: 100%; font-size: 12px; display: flex; } .tool a { color: #999; text-align: center; flex-grow: 1; } /*行标样式*/ div.numberedtextarea-wrapper { position: relative; height: 100%; } div.numberedtextarea-wrapper textarea { display: block; -webkit-box-sizing: border-box; -moz-box-sizing: border-box; box-sizing: border-box; } div.numberedtextarea-line-numbers { position: absolute; display: none; background-color: #fafafa; top: 0; left: 0; right: 0; bottom: 0; width: 40px; border-right: 1px dashed #eee; border-bottom: solid 1px #ddd; color: #999; overflow: hidden; } div.numberedtextarea-number { padding-right: 6px; text-align: center; } .objc_keyword { color: #AA0D91; } .objc_className

item.title: RSA测试
item.description: textarea { width: 100%; border-width: 0px; border-radius: 0px; resize: none; outline: none; } .form-radio { display: inline-block; } .form-input { font: 12px; color: black; } document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function () { $('#gnKeyButton').on('click', function () { var sKeySize = $('#keysize').text(); var j = parseInt(sKeySize); //就 var crypt = new JSEncrypt({ default_key_size: j }); $('#privkey').val(crypt.getPrivateKey()); $('#pubkey').val(crypt.getPublicKey()); }); $("#encrypt").on('click', function () { //ciphertext var encrypt = new JSEncrypt(); encrypt.setPublicKey($('#pubkey').val()); var encrypted = encrypt.encrypt($('#plaintext').val()); $('#ciphertext').val(encrypted); }); $("#decrypt").on('click', function () { //plaintext var decrypt = new JSEncrypt(); decrypt.setPrivateKey($('#privkey').val()); var uncrypted = decrypt.decrypt($('#ciphertext').val()); $('#plaintext').val(uncrypted); }); }); 512bit 1024bit 2048bit 重新生成512
